root.text:
Checkout Sheet - NEW PATIENT - 04/30/2009

Bhlradhr,Cxthwe L is a 80 year old White, Not Hispanic Or Latino male with Active activity level and Diabetes for 17 years

Laboratory (latest values in last 12 mo):
  03/19/2009
    CBC Hgb 14.4, plat 244
    eGFR 100
  04/22/2009
    AST 19
    ALT 5

Cardiovascular Risk Status
  Primary Factors - HIGH - Known circulatory sequela, Angina, PVD, Carotid Bruit
  Other Factors - HIGH - HTN, Low HDL (38), CHF

Microvascular Risk Status
  Eye - INTERMEDIATE - Cataracts
  Kidney - HIGH - Known renal sequela
  Nerve - HIGH - Autonomic Neuropathy, Foot Lesions

Treatment goals and status
  A1c - goal <9.0% - current 5.4 - last 12 mo 5.4, 5.7, 5.4
  LDL - goal <100.0 mg/dL - current 76.6 - last 12 mo: 114.5, 76.6
  BP - goal <130/80 mmHg - current 130/73 - last 12 mo: 123/71 (avg of 28 values)

Actions:
1. Order MAU test and RTC in 1 wk

2. Start Simvastatin 20mg HS

3. Start Aspirin 325 mg
